title: Modern Typewriter-like font
content:
I’ve been looking for this font for a while now and have noticed it popping up here and there.  
It sort of looks like Rockwell but it most definitely is not.

It is used by both Loyola University in Maryland and Connecticut College.  
Can also be found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013245/http:/www.loyola.edu/)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013245/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_298.png) | 21 KB |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013245/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_169.png) | 7.39 KB |
author: Kringdon5
